name: df-dmat
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cdmat, cmpo(s0, s1, cfn, universe, crab(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1))), wral(s3, cv(s0), wral(s4, cv(s0), wi(wne(cv(s3), cv(s4)), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ DMat =(s0 ‚àà Fin, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat]s1))| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s0,(s3 ‚â† s4 ‚Üí(s3[s2]s4)=(0 ` s1))))})
comment: Define the set of n x n diagonal (square) matrices over a set (usually a ring) r, see definition in [Roman] p. 4 or Definition 3.12 in [Hefferon] p. 240. (Contributed by AV, 8-Dec-2019.)
